title: Understanding Spectroscopy
text: Spectroscopy is a technique that involves the study of the interaction between matter and electromagnetic radiation. It is used to analyze the composition and properties of substances.

title: Types of Spectroscopy
text: There are various types of spectroscopy, including UV-Vis, IR, NMR, and Mass Spectroscopy, each focusing on different aspects of the electromagnetic spectrum.

title: Fundamental Principle of Spectroscopy
text: What is the fundamental principle that spectroscopy relies on?

title: Importance of Spectroscopy
text: Spectroscopy is crucial in scientific research as it helps in identifying substances, determining their structure, and understanding their properties.
